title.native: ブルーロック VS. U-20 JAPAN

description:
The second season of Blue Lock.

The hottest soccer matches start again as the U-20 Japan National Team makes their debut!

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

tags.name: Football
tags.description: Centers around the sport of football (known in the USA as "soccer").

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Torture
tags.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Snowscape
tags.description: Prominently or partially set in a snowy environment.

title.native: ブルーロック
ブルーロック

node.description: Graduated from Osaka Prefectural Imamiya High School. Graduated from the Manga Produce Course, Faculty of Manga, Kyoto Seika University.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/inokoriinosan) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岸本卓)

Originally an employee at [Studio Ghibli](https://anilist.co/studio/21/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/inokoriinosan) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/岸本卓)

Originally an employee at [Studio Ghibli](https://anilist.co/studio/21/).
Graduated from Osaka Prefectural Imamiya High School. Graduated from the Manga Produce Course, Faculty of Manga, Kyoto Seika University.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1248440090923171840)

Freelance animator formerly affiliated with Studio Live.

She started first gaining attention among fans on [Hunter x Hunter (2011)](https://anilist.co/anime/11061/), in which she was highly praised for her work as one of the regular animation directors. In 2015, she made her debut as a character designer on [Ushio and Tora](https://anilist.co/anime/21038/) and also served as the sole chief animation director over its three-cour run.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1248440090923171840)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1248440090923171840)

Freelance animator formerly affiliated with Studio Live.

She started first gaining attention among fans on [Hunter x Hunter (2011)](https://anilist.co/anime/11061/), in which she was highly praised for her work as one of the regular animation directors. In 2015, she made her debut as a character designer on [Ushio and Tora](https://anilist.co/anime/21038/) and also served as the sole chief animation director over its three-cour run.
Hidenori Kosuge is a production assistant.
